column4: k my noob friend just chmod 700 his /usr.  Is there any way I can fix it with the Live Cd or something?
by any chance is it Filipe245? He asked the same thing earlier, am surprised why nobody responded.
yes, he is b my side, he rebooted and of course gnome didnt open. He cant even sudo anymore
we are just looking for a way to fix it without total reinstall
